```{r}
  #Wilkokson homogeneity
  n = 500
  m = 600
  
  X = rnorm(n, mean=0, sd=1)
  Y = rnorm(m, mean=0, sd=1)
  
  Z = c(X, Y)
  Ri = rank(Z)
  Ri = Ri[1:n]
  
  Tnm = sum(Ri)
  Tnm0 = (Tnm - n/2*(n + m + 1))/(sqrt(((m*n)/12) * (m + n + 1)))

  alpha = 0.01
  za = qnorm(1 - alpha/2)
  
  if (abs(Tnm0) > za) {
    cat("H0 rejected with alpha = ", alpha, "\n")
  } else {
    cat("H0 accepted with alpha = ", alpha, "\n")
  }
```
```{r}
  #Wilkokson heterogeneity
  n = 500
  m = 600
  s = 300
  
  X = rnorm(n, mean=0, sd=1)
  Y = rnorm(m, mean=0, sd=1)
  S = rexp(s, rate=1)
  Y = c(S, Y[m-s:m])
  
  
  Z = c(X, Y)
  Ri = rank(Z)
  Ri = Ri[1:n]
  
  Tnm = sum(Ri)
  Tnm0 = (Tnm - n/2*(n + m + 1))/(sqrt(((m*n)/12) * (m + n + 1)))

  alpha = 0.01
  za = qnorm(1 - alpha/2)
  
  if (abs(Tnm0) > za) {
    cat("H0 rejected with alpha = ", alpha, "\n")
  } else {
    cat("H0 accepted with alpha = ", alpha, "\n")
  }
```
